A shiny module that generates a linear model definition via flm_def.

Source: R/flm_def-shiny.R
flmDefRun.Rd
model_info <- fds %>%
  FacileData::filter_samples(indication == "BLCA") %>%
  flm_def(covariate = "sample_type", numer = "tumor", denom = "normal",
          batch = "sex")
flmDefRun(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  rfds,
  default_covariate = NULL,
  ...,
  debug = FALSE,
  .reactive = TRUE
)

Value

A ReactiveFacileLinearModelDefinition object, the output from flm_def().
